summary: Brand text and document title were updated to “MD SUHEL”, footer copyright was updated, and a blue-themed palette was applied via CSS variables. The header now references a generated logo image under /assets/generated, but the actual logo asset file does not appear to have been added in this diff. Some additional non-requested metadata/attribution changes were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a logo in the header using a generated static image selected by the system, loaded from a static asset path under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: Header references the logo path, but the diff shows no added files; the required static image asset does not appear to have been created/added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified footer attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking and a CoffeeScript icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for branding name updates, blue background theme, and a header logo. It did not request adding or changing third-party attribution/UTM links or adding new icons.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (SiCoffeescript import; “Built with ... using caffeine.ai” link with UTM parameters)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced repository metadata summaries (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) referencing the branding changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements are frontend UI changes (branding/theme/logo). It did not request adding/updating project metadata summary files.
